description: Firefighters are tackling remaining "hot spots" near the abandoned nuclear plant, officials say.
title: Chernobyl fire under control, Ukraine officials say
title_page: Chernobyl fire under control, Ukraine officials say - BBC News
maintext: Local tour operator Yaroslav Emelianenko said on Monday that one fire had reached Pripyat and was even just 2km (1.24 miles) from where the most dangerous waste from the plant was stored. "The situation is critical," he wrote on Facebook.
